variables.input:
timeseries { avg(programs.info), value.A = avg(programs.info, scalar: true) }, by: { host.name }
| fields host.name

0.content:
## üñ•Ô∏è Host Profile Dashboard

### Complete Machine Specification and Software Inventory

Detailed view of a single host including:

**üíª System Information:**
- Hostname and entity details
- Operating system and version
- IP addresses
- CPU and memory specifications

**üì¶ Software Inventory:**
- Complete installed program list
- Installation dates and versions
- Software publishers
- Installation locations

**üìä Statistics:**
- Total installed programs
- Recent installations
- Software distribution by publisher

1.title: üñ•Ô∏è Host Information
1.query:
fetch dt.entity.host
//| filter matchesValue(entity.name,$hostname)
| fields 
    entity.name,
    osType,
    osVersion,
    cpuCores = cpuCores,
    physicalMemory = physicalMemory,
    ipAddress = toIP(ipAddress),
 //   lastSeenTms,
    monitoringMode
| fieldsAdd 
//    last_seen = formatTimestamp(lastSeenTms, format:"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"),
    memory_gb = round(physicalMemory / 1073741824, decimals: 2)
| fields 
    hostname = entity.name,
    os = osType,
    os_version = osVersion,
    cpu_cores = cpuCores,
    memory_gb,
    ip_addresses = toString(ipAddress),
  //  last_seen,
    monitoring = monitoringMode
| parse hostname, """LD:host.name "."
"""
| fieldsAdd hostname = if(isNotNull(host.name), then:host.name, else:hostname)
| fieldsRemove host.name
| filter hostname == $hostname

2.title: Total Programs Installed

3.title: üíæ Complete Software List

4.title: üè¢ Software by Publisher

5.title: üìÖ Recent Installations (Last 180 Days)

6.title: üî¢ Unique Publishers
6.query:
timeseries count = avg(programs.info), by: {program_publisher, host.name}
| filter matchesValue(host.name,$hostname)
| filter program_publisher != "" AND program_publisher != "Unknown"
| summarize publisher_count = countDistinct(program_publisher)

7.title: üìà Software Distribution

8.content:
## üìä Host Statistics

**System Metrics:**
- Total installed programs
- Number of unique software publishers
- Recent installations tracked

**Software Categories:**
- Operating system native tools
- Third-party applications
- Development tools and runtimes
- Security software

**Note:** This dashboard shows data for a single host. Use the hostname filter to switch between different machines.

9.title: üîç Microsoft Software
